title: Easy Homemade Italian Dressing
directions: Whisk all ingredients together and allow to sit. Giving the dressing some time to mingle will not only infuse flavor into the oil/vinegar but also soften the dry herbs and seasoning. This dressing will keep in your fridge for about a week so make extra to drizzle over a week's worth of salads! Enjoy!
ingredients: ¼ cup extra virgin olive oil
¼ cup white wine or champagne vinegar
1 TBSP Mrs Dash Italian seasoning blend
freshly ground black pepper, to taste
a pinch of red pepper flakes

Feel free to adjust oil-to-vinegar ration to taste. The above measurements are my idea of perfection in a vinaigrette and I love how refreshing it is! I promise not to pout if you add a little extra olive oil.
